topic.title: How to Change/Reset the Table Numbering

body.p: There are cases when you need to change the aspect of the table counter that is shown before the table titles. By default the table titles are formatted like this:
The "NN" is the number of the table, that starts being counted from the beginning of the publication.

One case is to have the NN counter to be incremented only within one topic. E.g. topic 1 with "Table 1" and "Table 2", and the first table in the next topic – topic 2 – should be again "Table 1" (instead of "Table 3").
For the pdf-css transformation type ( the DITA Map PDF - based on DITA & CSS (WYSIWYG) scenario), you must reset the table counter on each topic:

For the pdf-css-html5 transformation type (the DITA Map PDF - based on HTML5 & CSS scenario) , you should reset the table counter on each topic, then hide the label from the table caption (this is generated by the XSL transformation), and create another label, using a :before on the caption.
